summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Depot Street from "A" Street to "F" Street, and Depot Street produced from "F" Street to the center line of Section Twenty-four (24), Township Twenty-four (24) north, Range Three (3) east W. M., said production being along the existing County Road, following the north and south center lines of sections thirteen (13) and twenty-four (24), said township and Range, and Thirteenth Street as platted on the north side of West Side Addition from the center of said Section Twenty-four (24) to the center line of Alder Street as platted in said West Side Addition, by grading and planking the same, in accordance with Resolution No. 959 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle te\
